verses.roman:
śiṣyāra śrama dekhi' guru nācāna rākhilā
'kṛpā' nā nācāya, 'vāṇī' vasiyā rahilā

synonyms: śiṣyāra—of the disciples; śrama—the fatigue; dekhi'-seeing; guru—the spiritual master; nācāna rākhilā—stopped causing the dancing; kṛpā—mercy; nā nācāya—does not make dance; vāṇī—the words; vasiyā—sitting down; rahilā—remain silent.
translation: Seeing the fatigue of the disciples, the spiritual master has stopped making them dance, and because that mercy no longer makes them dance, my words now sit silently.
